titlestmt.titleproper: Rockefeller University records, Published Works using materials from the RU archives
A Guide to the Rockefeller University records, Published Works using materials from the RU archives FA851

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2019-06-11 00:03:20 -0400.

revisiondesc.item: Paper finding aid converted to EAD/XML by AureXus in 2010. Imported into the Archvists’ Toolkit by Becky Robbins.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller University records, Published Works using materials from the RU archives

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation note
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research with select materials restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Majority of the publications date from the 1980s.

did.unittitle: M. Sluyser, "De ontdekking van DNA" Natur en techniek. 49⁶ jaargang. (April 1981), 280-299

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes photographs of Oswald T. Avery, p. 286, and laboratory of P.A. Levene, pp. 295-296.

did.unittitle: R.J.M. Butzelaar, Het bedreigde been amputatie of vaatreconstructie een na-onderzoek over 5 tot 10 jaar. 1981. Drukkerij Van Gorcum Assen. Omslag: Maarten Breuker

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes photograph of Alexis Carrel, p. 4.

did.unittitle: John Hatcher, "Simon Flexner, " The Gazette of the Institute of Medical Laboratory Sciences 25 (August 1981) pp. 317-318

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes photograph of Simon Flexner, p. 317.

did.unittitle: A. McGehee Harvey, M.D., "Francis Weld Peabody: The blending of general Internal medicine and clinical science" The Pharos 44 (Summer 1981) pp. 6-8

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes photograph of the Hospital. staff, 1912.

did.unittitle: Philip J. Pauly, "Jacques Loeb and the Control of Life: An Experimental Biologist in Germany and America, 1859-1924" copyright 1980, The Johns Hopkins University Ph. D. 1981; see especially Chapter X, "The Temple of Pure Science: Loeb at The Rockefeller Institute, 1910-1924" pp. 237-283

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: [Library has copy of dissertation; photocopy of Chapter X in this file].

did.unittitle: A. McGehee Harvey, M.D. Research and Discovery in Medicine. Contributions from Johns Hopkins (Baltimore and London: The Johns Hopkins University Press, copyright 1981)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes photograph of the Hospital staff, 1912, page 254.

did.unittitle: Elmer Bendiner, "Past and Present. Heidelberger at 95, Still 'Pig-headedly' Productive" Hospital Practice 18: 214-215, 220-22, 226-27, 230-34 (October 1983)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes photograph of the Hospital Staff, 1923, p. 227.

did.unittitle: Christopher Gray. "The More Stately Mansions of Madison Avenue" AVENUE, Vol. 8, No 1 (September 1983) 59-69

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes photograph of Christian A. Herter. Photograph by G.C. Cox, page 65.

did.unittitle: Elmer Bendiner, "Past HOSPITAL PRACTICE 19 (February 1984) 222-223, 227, 231, 234-236, 238, 242-243, 246-247, 250, 254-255 and Present. Noguchi: Many Triumphs and a Brilliant Failure"

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes photographs of Noguchi, H. p. 223
p. 235 Noguchi extracting a sample of snake venom at medical school in Bahia, Brazil.
p. 243. Noguchi chatting with Frederick G. Banting (shortly after the discovery of insulin at RI.
p. 247. 1927 Noguchi in an open surfboat landing at Accra.
p. 255 Noguchi is shown dissecting a monkey in Accra with Alexander Mahaffy looking on.

did.unittitle: "In Memoriam. Stanley W. Sajdera 1939-1975" by "DDD". Program for Gordon Research Conference on Proteoglycans. Plymouth State College (N), Plymouth, New Hampshire. June 11-15, 1984. Chairman: Klaus Kuettner, Ph. D. Vice- Chairman: Vincent Hascall, Ph. D.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes photograph of Stanley Sajdera from RU Archives.

did.unittitle: Christopher Gray. "The River's Rustic Charm Gives Way to Commerce" AVENUE (June-July-August 1984) 68-77

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes photograph of Boxers, Pastime Athletic Club, ca 1900. [See also 412 (3) 1].
See also: Directory of Graduates (New York: The Rockefeller University, 1984). RG 600-15 25th anniversary of graduates.

did.unittitle: Ward, Patricia Spain, "The Other Abraham: Flexner in Illinois". In: Caduceus 2 (Spring 1986) pp 1-69

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: [includes] photograph of A. Flexner from Rockefeller University Archives opposite page 1. See also: S. Flexner papers RG 301. 6, Box 3, for publication.

did.unittitle: Koch, Sabine, re Erdmann, Rhoda: Leben und Werk der Zellforscherin Rhoda Erdmann (1870-1935). Inaugural-Dissertation zur Erlangung des Doktorgrades der gesamten Medizin. Dem Fachbereich Humanmedizin der Philipps-Universität Marburg vorgelegt von Sabine Koch aus Friedberg in Hessen, Marburg 1985. Aus dem Institut für Geschichte der Medizin in Marburg. Direktor: Prof. Dr. Hans H. Lauer
"Alfred Ogle Shaklee" in Descendants of Peter Shaklee (1756-1834), William E. Shaklee, ed., Vol. VI, No. 3, September 1986, pp. 33-34 (to be continued)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Added 12/86, Vol. VI, No. 4, December 1986, pp. 40-43.
Given to Mrs. Mirsky for RUL[?],23 October 1986.

did.unittitle: Edward O. Dodson and Peter Dodson, Evolution: Process and Product (Boston: Prindle, Weber, and Schmidt, 1985). 3rd edition. RUA Photo of T. Dobzhansky, p. 117
Robert H. Tamarin, Principles of Genetics. 2nd edition (Boston: Prindle, Weber, and Schmidt, 1986). RUA photo of Peyton Rous, p. 570
Reprint. Lily E. Kay, "W.M. Stanley's Crystallization of the Tobacco Mosaic Virus, 1930-1940" Isis 77: 450-472 (1986)

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: From Lily E. Kay, received 5 December 1986.

did.unittitle: Reprint. Steven J. Peitzman, M.D., "Nephrology in the United States from Osler to the Artificial Kidney" Annals of Internal Medicine (December 1986) 105: 937-946

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: From Steven J. Peitzman, M.D., received 30 January 1987.

Witkowski, J.A. "Dr. Carrel's Immortal Cells" Medical History. 1980, 24: 129-142

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Talk presented at Southern Association for the History of Medicine and Science meeting 2006.

did.unittitle: Jeffrey L. Cruikshank, A Delicate Experiment: The Harvard Business School,1908-1945. (Boston, Massachusetts: Harvard Business School Press, 1987)
